item.description:
WEIL ES SOOOO SCHOEN WAR - LET'S DO IT AGAIN!!!

The Pawtucket German-American Cultural Society was a great place to meet: good German food, tasty cold German beer and lots of space to sit around and talk and laugh. I would like to make this our NEW STAMMTISCH LOCATION from now on!!!

So mark your calendars every 3rd Friday of the month, we'll be meeting in Pawtucket for a night of fun together. Come check us out, if you haven't already!!

Look forward to seeing many of you on the 16th!

Bis bald - viele Gruesse,

 

Hanna
item.how_to_find_us: At the Ratskeller - red door on the back of the building - look for a bunch of smiling people and the German Flag!
item.name: New Stammtisch at the Pawtucket German-American Cultural Society!!!
